text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires confirmation that the Reporting Cadence for the GAAR Defense control is set at a minimum frequency of quarterly updates to the Audit Committee. Control Point #4 addresses GAAR Exposure Register. The 'Reporting Cadence to Audit Committee' column for Control Point #4 explicitly states: 'Monthly – Register snapshot; Quarterly – Heat-map of risk exposure and mitigation status.' Furthermore, the 'Reporting Cadence Summary' table lists 'Quarterly' as the cadence for the 'Audit-Committee Tax-Risk Package,' which includes GAAR status. This satisfies the requirement for a minimum quarterly update frequency for the Audit Committee regarding GAAR exposure controls.", "criterion_id": "31bc88c7-9bb4-4cb0-a9f5-8499628bdaf1"}
